NMDA-type glutamate-gated cationic chann.Definition: Tetrameric receptor, consisting of two glycine binding NR1 subunits and two glutamate binding NR2 subunits.  The glycine-binding NR3 subunits can also assemble with NR2 subunits.  NR1 and NR3 subunits assemble only in xenopus oocytes to form a glycine gated receptor.  NMDA receptors bind glutamate, aspartate, NMDA, NMDA receptors' conductance is modified by glycine, Magnesium, Zinc and 2-amino-5-phosphonovalerate (APV)Laube et al., suggest that the recombinant NMDA receptor is a tetramer (PMID: 9526012, also see PMID: 18779583).
